title: Sunshine Coast: African-Themed Cottage Stay with Daily Breakfast Hamper
description: One of the Sunshine Coast’s true hidden treasures, The African Village is made up of themed cottages gorgeously designed with local wood, stone and pitched roofs with epic views, and a prime location amid a vast swathe of wildlife-rich rainforest. Your slice of Africa awaits in Maleny with a daily breakfast hamper, a bottle of local wine on arrival and 10% off food and drinks at The Barrel at Clouds Vineyard or the nearby The Glasshouse at Clouds Montville.
offer_address: 943 Maleny - Montville Rd, Balmoral Ridge QLD 4552

title: African-Inspired Cottage Escape near the Sunshine Coast
description: Always wanted to experience a safari, but never had the chance? Feel like you are in the heart of Africa with a stay at The African Village, offering deluxe, African-themed accommodation in the picturesque town of Maleny. Escape the ordinary for a unique stay in the Sunshine Coast hinterland as you enjoy a daily breakfast hamper, a bottle of local wine on arrival and two AU$15 dining credits for Cloud Café, a favourite in the area.
offer_address: 943 Maleny - Montville Rd, Balmoral Ridge QLD 4552

title: ​Award-Winning Sunshine Coast Hinterland Boutique Retreat with Self-Contained Villas & Rainforest Views
description:
Disconnect from daily demands and settle into stillness at this family-run retreat perfectly positioned along the Obi Obi Creek. Wake up to the whispers of the creek and native wildlife, sip your morning coffee on the private balcony peeking through the lush foliage and breathe in the mountainous air with a yoga session.

Uniquely positioned in the heart of Maleny, spend your days meandering through the hinterland town's artisan shops, charming boutiques and cafes. Later, explore the surrounding natural wonders - perhaps a stroll through the Botanic Gardens or kayak through the picturesque Baroon Pocket Dam. When the sun sets, unwind in your private villa, pop open a bottle of wine and graze on a cheese platter featuring local produce.

title: Tranquil Sunshine Coast Hinterland One- and Two-Bedroom Self-Contained Cottages
description:
Unplug and connect with nature amongst rolling hills and lush rainforest at Whispering Valley Cottages Maleny. Hidden within 46 acres of Sunshine Coast hinterland, this peaceful retreat is the perfect place to switch off, with everything you need to relax - enjoy a romantic picnic by the dam, luxurious in-room massage, or soak in the spa bath with a breathtaking view. Spend the afternoon with the whole family exploring the beautiful property; mingle with the resident donkeys and cows, practise your orienteering skills, and look out for bush and rainforest birds that visit the valley.

Venture outside the property to explore the charming Hinterland region. Visit the vibrant Eumundi Markets, see local cheesemakers in action at Maleny Cheese, stop in for a taste test at Maleny Mountain Wines, and spend hours traversing the picturesque Mary Cairncross Park. As the sun sets, return to your idyllic sanctuary under the stars.
offer_address: 35 Rose Gum Lane, Maleny 4552, Queensland, Australia

title: Sunshine Coast Hinterland Award-Winning Boutique Villas with Mount Ngungun Tour Upgrade Available
description:
Disconnect from daily demands and settle into stillness at this family-run retreat perfectly positioned along the Obi Obi Creek. Wake up to the whispers of the creek and native wildlife, sip your morning coffee on your private balcony peeking through the lush foliage and breathe in the mountainous air with a yoga session.

Uniquely positioned in the heart of Maleny, spend your days meandering through the hinterland town's artisan shops, charming boutiques and cafes. Later, explore the surrounding natural wonders - perhaps a stroll through the Botanic Gardens or kayak through the picturesque Baroon Pocket Dam.

As the sun dips below the horizon, retreat to your private villa, uncork a fine bottle of wine and savour a curated cheese platter of local treasures - the epitome of quiet luxury.

title: Romantic Cottage Hideaway in the Sunshine Coast Hinterland
description:
Escape to the Sunshine Coast hinterland and indulge in an ultra-romantic, boutique stay with your special someone at the adults-only Blue Summit Cottages. Nestled high in the mountains on 80 acres of vibrant rolling mountainside and surrounded by spectacular views and postcard-worthy sunsets, these cottages are the perfect setting to create memories that will last a lifetime.

Enjoy a relaxing stay with a daily gourmet breakfast hamper, a bottle of wine on arrival and two A$25 massage vouchers to put towards in-room treatments.

title: Maleny Cottage Escape with African Dining Experiences
description: Whisk your family or other half away for a unique stay in the picturesque village of Maleny on the Sunshine Coast. Stay in a well-appointed, self-contained cottage at The African Cottage and enjoy a candlelit African dining experience, a breakfast hamper and a voucher towards Gourmet Afrika. Located 20 minutes from the Australian Zoo!
offer_address: 43 Maleny - Montville Rd, Balmoral Ridge QLD 4552

title: Romantic Cottage Hideaway in the Secluded Mountainside with Breakfast Hamper, Bottle of Wine and Spa Vouchers
description: Escape to the Sunshine Coast hinterland and indulge in an ultra-romantic, boutique stay with your special someone at Blue Summit Cottages. Nestled high in the mountains, the spectacular views and postcard-worthy sunsets are enough to write home about. Escape to 80 acres of vibrant rolling mountainside with a two or three-night stay that’ll have you enjoying a breakfast hamper, welcome bottle of red, white or sparkling wine and two massage vouchers to use on in-room spa treatments.

title: Boutique Sunshine Coast Hinterland Escape
description: Connect with nature at the family-run Whispering Valley Cottages Maleny, where you will find hiking trails, resident donkeys and complete tranquility. Hidden within 46 acres of Sunshine Coast hinterland, this peaceful retreat is the perfect getaway. Enjoy a romantic picnic by the lake or luxurious in-room massage, or bring the whole family along to mingle with the cheeky donkeys, and spend afternoons exploring the beautiful property gardens.
offer_address: 35 Rose Gum Lane, Maleny 4552, Queensland, Australia
